participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and practical, Jake has a strong sense of responsibility and values family.
participant_1.background: my cats are very special to me. i'm a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i've 5 cats.

participant_2.name: Priya
participant_2.personality: Free-spirited and adventurous, Priya embraces her individuality while balancing her traditional upbringing.
participant_2.background: my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal. i'm a swim coach at my local pool.

content.text: hello how are you doing today? i'm good.
